weather_report:
As the sun ascends in the azure expanse above Boston, today greets residents with a refreshing embrace. The air is crisp, carrying a gentle northwest breeze that whispers past, invigorating the spirit. With the mercury reaching a modest height, the day promises warmth while maintaining clarity—an invitation to step outside and savor the sunlight's gentle caress on the skin. Tonight, as the golden hues of dusk surrender to twilight, a serene coolness will descend, wrapping the city in a comforting chill, perfect for cozying up with a good book or sharing quiet moments under the stars.

Dressing appropriately for the day calls for light layers—perhaps a breathable shirt accompanied by a charming light jacket for when the sun slips away. As work and wanderlust pull the landscape of the day wide open, one might find satisfaction in a stroll along the riverbanks or a visit to a local café for warm coffee and contemplative thought. In this delightful weather, every moment breathes possibility, asking only for an open heart and a willing mind to embrace the simple joys scattered throughout the city.
